title: Metal Slug X with Update 1 - 3DM
description:
Instructions
You only need to extract and play the game by launching the exe in the Metal Slug folder but I'd recommend following the instructions below for a better experience.

1. Extract using Winrar or 7-zip
2. Cut Metal Slug X folder to C:Program Files
3. Now into C:Program FilesMetal Slug X , right click mslugx.exe and send to desktop. Do this twice.
4. Rename Metal slug X desktop shortcut to Metal Slug X and drag it into C:ProgramDataMicrosoftWindowsStart MenuPrograms
5. Rename the other shortcut on desktop to Metal Slug X

If you have any trouble with the game, make sure you:
1. Install the redistributables
2. Run game as admin

7zip compressed size: 72.6 MB
Uncompressed size: 131 MB
